 10#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REPLICATED_MAP_HPP
 11#define VSIP_IMPL_REPLICATED_MAP_HPP
 12
 13/***********************************************************************
 14  Included Files
 15***********************************************************************/
 16
 17#include <vsip/core/vector_iterator.hpp>
 18#include <vsip/core/parallel/services.hpp>
 19#include <vsip/core/parallel/map_traits.hpp>
 20#include <vsip/core/parallel/util.hpp>
 21#include <vsip/core/block_traits.hpp>
 22#include <vsip/core/sv_block.hpp>
 23
 24
 25
 26/***********************************************************************
 27  Declarations
 28***********************************************************************/
 29
 30namespace vsip
 31{
 32
 33template <dimension_type Dim>
 34class Replicated_map
 35{
 36  // Compile-time typedefs.
 37public:
 38  typedef impl::Vector_iterator<Vector<processor_type> > processor_iterator;
 39  typedef std::vector<processor_type> impl_pvec_type;
 40  typedef impl::Sv_local_block<processor_type> pset_block_type;
 41
 42  // Replicated_map_data
 43private:
 44  struct Data : public impl::Ref_count<Data>, impl::Non_copyable
 45  {
 46
 47    Data(length_type np)
 48      : pset_(np)
 49    {}
 50
 51    ~Data()
 52    {
 53      impl::destroy_ll_pset(ll_pset_);
 54    }
 55
 56    void init_ll_pset()
 57    {
 58      impl::create_ll_pset(pset_.impl_vector(), ll_pset_);
 59    }
 60
 61    // Member data.
 62  public:
 63    pset_block_type        pset_;
 64    impl::par_ll_pset_type ll_pset_;
 65  };
 66
 67
 68
 69  // Constructor.
 70public:
 71  Replicated_map()
 72    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc));
 73
 74  template <typename Block>
 75  Replicated_map(const_Vector<processor_type, Block> pset)
 76    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc));
 77
 78  ~Replicated_map()
 79  {
 80  }
 81
 82  // Default copy constructor and assignment operator are correct.
 83
 84  // Accessors.
 85public:
 86  // Information on individual distributions.
 87  distribution_type distribution     (dimension_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 88    { return whole; }
 89  length_type       num_subblocks    (dimension_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 90    { return 1; }
 91  length_type       cyclic_contiguity(dimension_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 92    { return 0; }
 93
 94  length_type num_subblocks() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return 1; }
 95
 96  index_type subblock(processor_type pr) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 97  {
 98    if (this->impl_rank_from_proc(pr) != no_rank)
 99      return 0;
100    else
101      return no_subblock;
102  }
103  index_type subblock() const VSIP_NOTHROW
104  { return this->subblock(local_processor()); }
105
106  length_type num_processors() const VSIP_NOTHROW
107    { return this->data_->pset_.size(); }
108
109  processor_iterator processor_begin(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
110  {
111    assert(sb == 0);
112    return processor_iterator(this->processor_set(), 0);
113  }
114
115  processor_iterator processor_end  (index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
116  {
117    assert(sb == 0);
118    return processor_iterator(this->processor_set(), this->num_processors());
119  }
120
121  const_Vector<processor_type, pset_block_type> processor_set() const
122  {
123    return const_Vector<processor_type, pset_block_type>(data_->pset_);
124  }
125
126  // Applied map functions.
127public:
128  length_type impl_num_patches(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
129    { assert(sb == 0); return 1; }
130
131  void impl_apply(Domain<Dim> const& dom) VSIP_NOTHROW
132    { dom_ = dom; }
133
134  template <dimension_type Dim2>
135  Domain<Dim2> impl_subblock_domain(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
136    { assert(sb == 0); return dom_; }
137
138  template <dimension_type Dim2>
139  impl::Length<Dim2> impl_subblock_extent(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
140    { assert(sb == 0); return extent(dom_); }
141
142  template <dimension_type Dim2>
143  Domain<Dim2> impl_global_domain(index_type sb, index_type patch)
144    const VSIP_NOTHROW
145    { assert(sb == 0 && patch == 0); return dom_; }
146
147  template <dimension_type Dim2>
148  Domain<Dim2> impl_local_domain (index_type sb, index_type patch)
149    const VSIP_NOTHROW
150    { assert(sb == 0 && patch == 0); return dom_; }
151
152  index_type impl_global_from_local_index(dimension_type /*d*/, index_type sb,
153					  index_type idx)
154    const VSIP_NOTHROW
155  { assert(sb == 0); return idx; }
156
157  index_type impl_local_from_global_index(dimension_type /*d*/, index_type idx)
158    const VSIP_NOTHROW
159  { return idx; }
160
161  template <dimension_type Dim2>
162  index_type impl_subblock_from_global_index(Index<Dim2> const& /*idx*/)
163    const VSIP_NOTHROW
164  { return 0; }
165
166  template <dimension_type Dim2>
167  Domain<Dim> impl_local_from_global_domain(index_type /*sb*/,
168					    Domain<Dim2> const& dom)
169    const VSIP_NOTHROW
170  {
171    VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT(Dim == Dim2);
172    return dom;
173  }
174
175  // Extensions.
176public:
177  impl::par_ll_pset_type impl_ll_pset() const VSIP_NOTHROW
178    { return data_->ll_pset_; }
179  impl::Communicator&    impl_comm() const
180    { return impl::default_communicator();}
181  impl_pvec_type const&  impl_pvec() const
182    { return data_->pset_.impl_vector(); }
183
184  length_type        impl_working_size() const
185    { return this->num_processors(); }
186
187  processor_type impl_proc_from_rank(index_type rank) const
188  {
189    assert(rank < this->num_processors());
190    return this->impl_pvec()[rank];
191  }
192
193  index_type impl_rank_from_proc(processor_type pr) const
194  {
195    for (index_type i=0; i<this->num_processors(); ++i)
196      if (data_->pset_.get(i) == pr) return i;
197    return no_rank;
198  }
199
200
201  // Member data.
202private:
203  Domain<Dim>                 dom_;		// Applied domain.
204  impl::Ref_counted_ptr<Data> data_;
205};
206
207
208
209template <dimension_type Dim>
210Replicated_map<Dim>::Replicated_map()
211  VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
212    : data_(new Data(vsip::num_processors()))
213{
214  for (index_type i=0; i<vsip::num_processors(); ++i)
215    data_->pset_.put(i, vsip::processor_set().get(i));
216
217  data_->init_ll_pset();
218}
219
220
221
222// Create a replicated_map with a given processor_set
223//
224// Requires
225//   PSET to be a non-empty set of valid processors.
226template <dimension_type Dim>
227template <typename Block>
228Replicated_map<Dim>::Replicated_map(
229  const_Vector<processor_type, Block> pset)
230  VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
231    : data_(new Data(pset.size()))
232{
233  assert(pset.size() > 0);
234  for (index_type i=0; i<pset.size(); ++i)
235    data_->pset_.put(i, pset.get(i));
236
237  data_->init_ll_pset();
238}
239
240
241
242namespace impl
243{
244
245template <dimension_type Dim>
246struct Is_global_map<Replicated_map<Dim> >
247{ static bool const value = true; };
248
249template <dimension_type Dim>
250struct Map_equal<Dim, Replicated_map<Dim>, Replicated_map<Dim> >
251{
252  static bool value(Replicated_map<Dim> const& a,
253		    Replicated_map<Dim> const& b)
254  {
255    if (a.num_processors() != b.num_processors())
256      return false;
257    for (index_type i=0; i<a.num_processors(); ++i)
258      if (a.impl_proc_from_rank(i) != b.impl_proc_from_rank(i))
259	return false;
260    return true;
261  }
262};
263
264} // namespace vsip::impl
265
266} // namespace vsip

268#endif // VSIP_IMPL_REPLICATED_MAP_HPP
